Header: Incumbent Commander, New Colonel of the Regiment, Special Forces
Content: Lieutenant General Shavendra Silva, Commander of the Army functions as the Colonel of the Regiment of the Special Forces with effect from 18 August 2019. Lieutenant General Shavendra Silva is also the Colonel of Regiment of the Gajaba Regiment. Formerly, General (Retd) Mahesh Senanayake, the former Commander of the Army was the Colonel of the Regiment, Special Forces.
